stage.heading: We're redifining undergarments

feature-rows.title: Fit
feature-rows.text: Longer, tapered design hugs the lower torso to prevent bunching and <abbr title="Excess Fabric Gut" class="popover-trigger" data-title="Excess Fabric Gut" data-placement="top" data-trigger="click">EFG</abbr>.

feature-rows.title: Control
feature-rows.text: Moves with you, while being invisible under your outter shirts.

feature-rows.title: Stay Dry
feature-rows.text: Controls your body temperature to keep you cool and confident all day.

feature-rows.title: Quick Draw Fly
